text: kaya vahee baantate[1] hain aapake paalanahaar kee daya? hamane baantee hai, unake beech, unakee jeevika saansaarik jeevan mein tatha hamane uchch kiya hai, unamen se ek ko doosare par, kaee shreniyaan. taaki ek-doosare se seva kaary len tatha aapake paalanahaar kee daya[1] usase uttam hai, jise ve ikattha kar rahe hain
